title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Judge Firing Reaction, Rodgers vs. Esiason and Mike Silver on Flores/Dolphins Break Up, Harbaugh's Next Move, Staley 2nd Guessing
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Judge Firing Reaction, Rodgers vs. Esiason and Mike Silver on Flores/Dolphins Break Up, Harbaugh's Next Move, Staley 2nd Guessing
description:
Colin gives his thoughts on the Giants firing Joe Judge after 2 seasons and why Judge didn't work out (3:00). He also lays out a theory about about Aaron Rodgers/Boomer Esiason's public beef (7:00), and gives a reality check to the Jimmy G haters (11:00), Then, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver joins Colin to discuss how Jimmy G's future with the 49ers could change in the next few weeks (14:00), why Garoppolo and Derek Carr deserve more credit than they're getting (21:00), what the Raiders will do at head coach (23:00), what really happened in the Brian Flores/Dolphins breakup (25:00), if Jim Harbaugh would really leave Michigan to return to the NFL (31:00), Brandon Staley's controversial 4th down call (39:00), how Bill Belichick handles those calls (42:00), and the biggest problem with the analytics crowd (44:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
